llm_res.rule: decimals - Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
totalSupply - Returns the total token supply.

llm_res:
YES

The function `totalSupply()` in the provided code violates the ERC-20 rule that requires it to return the total token supply. Instead of returning a constant total supply, the function adds 851 to `_tTotal`, which results in a different value than the defined total supply of tokens. This modification does not adhere to the standard requirement of returning the constant total token supply.
